PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-08762004-07-20,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActAuditor General Act
PrecisEnactment of a DIRECTION APPLYING THE AUDITOR GENERAL ACT SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT STRATEGY REQUIREMENTS TO CERTAIN DEPARTMENTS which applies subsections 24(1) and (2) of the Auditor General Act to (1) the Canada Border Services Agency, (2) the Canadian Firearms Centre, (3) the Department of Human Resources and Skills Development, (4) the Department of International Trade and (5) the Public Service Human Resources Management Agency of Canada, effective July 20, 2004.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2004-0109 Publication Date: 2004-08-11
AttachmentsAttachment
